line.text: UT: Greetings, friends. I gather that if my holo-projection is playing that you successfully reached Stryfe's Brain Trust area. Now listen carefully...
UT: There is a way to more easily combat Stryfe and his Brain Trust. There are two computer terminals in two seperate rooms that will allow you to deactivate one or two of his Brain Trusts.

UT: However, you'll need to acquire seperate access cards in order to gain acces to the deactivation process. Search the rooms down the hall, I'm certain you'll find the individuals who have said access cards.

UT: There's one more thing. It would seem that there si a Brain Trust testing room that can only be accessed through the sewer trench room. In that testing facility, if you are psychically gifted, you may be able to summon a phsychic demon to help you defeat Stryfe.
UT: That's all I have. You don't have to do these things I told you, but they certainly will make your job easier. It's up to you. Good luck.
